trans-unit.source: Provides information about an imaging codec.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre um codec de processamento de imagens.

trans-unit.source: A BitmapCodecInfo can be obtain for each codec in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser obter um BitmapCodecInfo para cada codec no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the author of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o autor do codec.

trans-unit.source: The author of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O autor do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the container format for the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o formato de contentor para o codec.

trans-unit.source: The container format of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O formato de contentor do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the device manufacturer of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o fabricante do dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: The device manufacturer of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O fabricante do dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the device models of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica os modelos de dispositivos do codec.

trans-unit.source: The device model of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de dispositivo do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the file extensions associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica as extensões de ficheiro associadas o codec.

trans-unit.source: The file extensions associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: As extensões de ficheiro associadas o codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the friendly name of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o nome amigável do codec.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the codec.
trans-unit.target: O nome amigável do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] associado o codec.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] types associated with the codec.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] associados o codec de tipos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the specification version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica a versão de especificação do codec.

trans-unit.source: The specification version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: A versão de especificação do codec.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the codec supports animation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o codec suporta animação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the codec supports animation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o codec suporta animação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the codec supports lossless of images.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o codec suporta sem perdas de imagens.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the codec supports lossless of images; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o codec suporta sem perdas de imagens; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies whether the codec supports multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica se o codec suporta vários fotogramas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the codec supports multiple frames; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o codec suportar frames Jumbo vários; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica a versão do codec.

trans-unit.source: The version of the codec.
trans-unit.target: A versão do codec.
